name: Polaris (itch) (heise-kun)
description:
A short and cute platformer, made by 14 first-year students at The Game Assembly in Malmö, Sweden. This game's genre was a part of our spring curriculum and was made with inspiration taken from Moon Studios' Ori and the Blind Forest.

Developement team:

Game Programming:
Anton Johansson
Benjamin Mättö
Erik Nossborn
Hugo Rogmark
Jens Berg
Rémi Mrozek

Level Design:
Gabriel Hector
William Fredriksson

Environment, UI & Character Art:
Anton Sjöholm
Sam Frisk
Sanna Friberg

Animation:
Alfred Egnér
Elin Carlström (heise-kun)
Tova Nyström

Music by Kevin MacLeod
